metadata.title: CVE-2015-6748 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in jsoup before 1.8.3. It was discovered that jsoup improperly handled certain HTML tags. An attacker could use this vulnerability to execute a cross-site scripting (XSS) attack.

criterions.comment: jsoup package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.10.2-2').
